analysisPopulations.name: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.description: The Screened Set will include all participants who signed an informed consent form (ICF).

analysisPopulations.name: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.description: The Enrolled Set will include all participants who were enrolled in the study.

analysisPopulations.name: Full Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: FA
analysisPopulations.description: The Full Analysis (FA) Set will include all enrolled participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840. The FA Set will be the primary population for all efficacy analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Per Protocol Set
analysisPopulations.label: PP
analysisPopulations.description: The Per Protocol (PP) Set will include all participants in the FA Set who have no major protocol deviations that could affect the primary efficacy endpoint. The PP Set will be used for sensitivity analyses of the primary efficacy endpoint.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Member of the FA Set with no major protocol deviations affecting the primary efficacy endpoint

analysisPopulations.name: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.label: SAF
analysisPopulations.description: The Safety Set will include all enrolled participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840. The Safety Set will be the primary population for all safety analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacokinetic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PK
analysisPopulations.description: The Pharmacokinetic (PK) Analysis Set will include all participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient plasma concentration data to allow for the derivation of at least 1 PK parameter.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Member of the Safety Set with sufficient plasma concentration data for derivation of at least 1 PK parameter

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacodynamic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PD
analysisPopulations.description: The Pharmacodynamic (PD) Analysis Set will include all participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient PD data to allow for the derivation of at least 1 PD parameter.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Member of the Safety Set with sufficient PD data for derivation of at least 1 PD parameter

characteristics.name: Age
characteristics.description: Age calculated as the integer part of the number of years from the date of birth to the date of informed consent.

characteristics.name: Duration of Wilson Disease
characteristics.description: Duration of Wilson Disease (WD) at baseline.

characteristics.name: Medical/Surgical History
characteristics.description: Medical and surgical history coded using MedDRA.

characteristics.name: Prior and Concomitant Medications
characteristics.description: Prior and concomitant medications coded using the WHO Drug Dictionary.

characteristics.name: Body Mass Index
characteristics.description: Body mass index (BMI) calculated as weight (kg) / [height (m)]^2 at baseline.
